subject: Golf
Millionaires and Billionaires
Marriages
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa, the world’s top-ranked women’s golfer, announced her engagement to Andrés Conesa, the director general of Aeroméxico airline, one of her sponsors. A spokeswoman for Ochoa, 27, would not give any details but added a date for the wedding had been set. It will be the first marriage for Ochoa. Conesa, 39, has three children from a previous marriage.
